alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Washington and central Jefferson Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were along a line extending from near Downs to near Moxley. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Wadley, Davisboro, Bartow, Riddleville, Downs, Moxley, Grange and Stapletons Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
